Basketball Players.name: Damian Lillard
Basketball Players.accolades: 8x All Star, 7x All-NBA, 2012-2013 All-Rookie, 2012-2013 ROY, NBA 75th Anniv. Team, Olympic Gold Medalist
Basketball Players.bio: Damian Lamonte Ollie Lillard is an American profession basketball player who currently plays PG for the Milwaukee Bucks. He was born on July 15, 1990 in Oakland, CA and attended Oakland HS and then Weber State University. He is well known for his relentless three point shooting ability and his tremendous leadership in clutch moments.

Basketball Players.name: Kyrie Irving
Basketball Players.team(s): Cleveland Cavaliers, Boston Celtics, Brooklyn Nets, Dallas Mavericks
Basketball Players.accolades: 8x All Star, 3x All-NBA, 2016 NBA Champ, 2011-2012 All-Rookie, 2011-12 ROY, Olympic Gold Medalist
Basketball Players.bio: Kyrie Andrew Irving is an Australian born professional basketball player who currently plays PG/SG for the Dallas Mavericks. He was born on March 23, 1992 in Melbourne, Australia before moving to the US at a young age. He grew up in West Orange, NJ and attended Saint Patrick HS and Duke University. He is widely regarded as one of the best ball-handlers and finishers in the history of the NBA and also has a polished jumpshot that can bail him out. His creativity and mastery is unmatched.

Basketball Players.name: Stephen Curry
Basketball Players.accolades: 10x All Star, 2x Scoring Champ, 4x NBA Champ, 10x All-NBA, 2009-10 All-Rookie, 2015-16 Steals Champ, 2x NBA MVP, 2021-22 WCF MVP, 2021-22 Finals MVP, NBA 75th Anniv. Team, Olympic Gold Medalist
Basketball Players.bio: Wardell Stephen Curry II is an American professional basketball player who currently plays PG for the Golden State Warriors. He was born on March 14, 1988 in Akron, Ohio and attended Charlotte Christian HS and then Davidson College. He is widely regarded as the greatest three point shooter in the history of the NBA and currently holds the NBA record for most three pointers made. His marksmanship from downtown along with his impeccable ball handling has created a new era of playstyle amongst player positions and has shifted the defense approach for teams regarding the three point shot. In late game situations, he has been known to dominate and close the game out.

Basketball Players.name: Lebron James
Basketball Players.team(s): Cleveland Cavaliers, Miami Heat, Los Angeles Lakers
Basketball Players.accolades: 20x NBA All Star, 2007-08 Scoring Champ, 20x All-NBA, 2003-04 ROY, 2003-04 All-Rookie, 4x NBA Champ, 4x NBA MVP, 4x Finals MVP, 6x All-Defensive, 2019-20 AST Champ, NBA 75th Anniv. Team, 4x Olympic Medalist(3G, 1B)
Basketball Players.bio: LeBron Raymone James is an American professional basketball player who currently plays PF for the Los Angeles Lakers. He was born on December 30, 1984 in Akron, Ohio and attended St. Vincent-St. Mary HS. He came into the NBA straight out of high school and from there on out has become one of the most dominant players and well known faces in the league. His ability to be a leader, play outstanding basketball on both sides and guard all five positions is none like any other. He has been able withstand the test of time and has been an impactful player in the NBA in regards to being able to lead his team to victory in clutch moments. He currently holds the record as the leader in points scored in the NBA at 40,000 and counting.

Basketball Players.name: Kevin Durant
Basketball Players.team(s): Seattle SuperSonics, Oklahoma City Thunder, Golden State Warriors, Brooklyn Nets, Phoenix Suns
Basketball Players.accolades: 14x NBA All-Star, 4x Scoring Champ, 2x NBA Champ, 2x Finals MVP, 11x All-NBA, 2007-08 All-Rookie, 2007-08 ROY, 2013-14 NBA MVP, NBA 75th Anniv. Team, 4x Olympic Gold Medalist
Basketball Players.bio: Kevin Wayne Durant is an American professional basketball player who currently plays PF for the Phoenix Suns. He was born on September 29, 1988 in Washington, D.C and attended National Christian Academy, Oak Hill Academy, Montrose Christian School and then the University of Texas. He is well known as one of the best scorers in the history of the NBA especially from midrange. His tall and slender frame, speed, and creativity mixed with his position has influenced a new playstyle within the PF positon earning him the nickname Slim Reaper. His hard work and passion for the sport has pushed him into greater heights and helped him to accomplish some respectable feats. He is also known for being a reliable closer in close game situations.

Basketball Players.name: Derrick Rose
Basketball Players.team(s): Chicago Bulls, New York Knicks, Cleveland Cavaliers, Minnesota Timberwolves, Detroit Pistons, Memphis Grizzlies
Basketball Players.accolades: 3x All Star, 2010-11 All-NBA, 2008-09 All-Rookie, 2008-09 ROY, 2010-11 NBA MVP, 2x FIBA Worl Cup Gold Medalist

Basketball Players.name: Carmelo Anthony
Basketball Players.team(s): Denver Nuggets, New York Knicks, Oklahoma City Thunder, Houston Rockets, Portland Trailblazers, Los Angeles Lakers
Basketball Players.accolades: 10x All Star, 2012-13 Scoring Champ, 6x All-NBA, 2003-04 All Rookie, NBA 75th Anniv. Team

Basketball Players.name: Kawhi Leonard
Basketball Players.team(s): San Antonio Spurs, Toronto Raptors, Los Angeles Clippers,
